definition: to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: I use flashcards to remember new English words.
sentences.chinese: 使用有圖有字的閃卡影象生字。

sentences.english: Hi Adam , I really would like to have an additional feature for the flashcard tests .
sentences.chinese: 喜亞當，我真的想有一個額外的功能，爲閃卡測試。

sentences.english: These will not be tested in the flashcard program .
sentences.chinese: 這些將不會進行測試，在閃卡計劃。

sentences.english: The Flashcard tool can be used in multiple ways to test your understanding.
sentences.chinese: 該閃卡工具，可用於多種方式來測試您的理解。
